title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4227.1 - Purpose and types of assistance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4227.1 - Purpose and types of assistance

State Regulations

The purpose of these regulations is to set forth the
application process, determine eligibility and codify administration by the
corporation of the Child Care Facilities Construction Program (the "program", as defined herein). The purpose of the program is to provide financial
assistance for the establishment, expansion and development of licensed, not-for-profit child day care centers intended to serve the needs of low-income
working families, economically distressed areas or highly distressed
communities (as such terms are defined below). The types of assistance
available from the corporation shall consist of child care construction grants, child care construction loan guarantees and child care construction revolving
loans. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21

4227.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
